sentences.en: A deluge of manuscripts began to arrive in the post.
sentences.cn: 大量的手稿开始通过邮递涌来。

sentences.en: Arrive two days early in order to acclimatize.
sentences.cn: 提前两天到达以便适应新环境。

sentences.en: Barring accidents, we should arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 除非有意外情况，我们应可按时到达。

sentences.en: Barring strong headwinds, the plane will arrive on schedule.
sentences.cn: 如果不是猛烈的顶头风, 飞机会准点到达的.

sentences.en: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.cn: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.en: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.cn: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.en: He should arrive within the next half-hour.
sentences.cn: 他应该会在半小时内到达。
我们有望在天黑前到达。

sentences.en: I must go and make myself presentable before the guests arrive.
sentences.cn: 趁客人还没到，我得去打扮一下好见人。

sentences.en: It is estimated that every year 50 unaccompanied children arrive in Britain.
sentences.cn: 据估计，每年有50名儿童独自来到英国。

sentences.en: Photographs of the crime scene began to arrive within twenty minutes.
sentences.cn: 不到20分钟，犯罪现场的照片就开始传来了。

sentences.en: Please make every endeavour to arrive on time.
Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.cn: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

sentences.en: Stop fussing about; the bus will arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 别慌, 公共汽车会准时到达.

sentences.en: The burglars took to their heels when they heard the police arrive.
sentences.cn: 窃贼听见警察来了,拔腿就跑.

sentences.en: Their planes usually arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 他们的飞机通常都会准时抵达。

sentences.en: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.cn: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

trans.tran_cn: 到达，送达，降临，发生，作出（决定），降生，获得成功
trans.tran_en: to get to the place you are going to
to get to the place you are going to

trans.tran_cn: 达到； 得出结论； 达成
trans.tran_en: to get to the place you are going to
